author: agemanning
content:
Just did another run on the DHT on mainnet. 
Looks like there are about 4k active nodes, and about 2.2k of those are unique ones with validators.

author: Deleted User
content: is it possible to know how many of those 2.2k are in cloud?i

author: agemanning
content: With a bit more effort and greater uncertainty, we could probably identify via IP address as to which are on cloud providers
